**大盾牌**（large shield）是[NetHack](/index.php?title=NetHack/zh-CN\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "NetHack/zh-CN (page does not exist)")中的一种[盾牌](/wiki/%E7%9B%BE%E7%89%8C "盾牌")类[防具](/wiki/%E9%98%B2%E5%85%B7 "防具")。它由[铁](/index.php?title=%E9%93%81\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "铁 (page does not exist)")制成。

[ ]

## Contents

- [1 生成](#.E7.94.9F.E6.88.90)

- [2 描述](#.E6.8F.8F.E8.BF.B0)

- [3 策略](#.E7.AD.96.E7.95.A5)

- [4 历史](#.E5.8E.86.E5.8F.B2)

- [5 Variants](#Variants)

  - [5.1 SLASH'EM](#SLASH.27EM)
  - [5.2 dNetHack](#dNetHack)
  - [5.3 SpliceHack](#SpliceHack)
  - [5.4 EvilHack](#EvilHack)
  - [5.5 SlashTHEM](#SlashTHEM)
  - [5.6 Hack'EM](#Hack.27EM)

- [6 引用及注释](#.E5.BC.95.E7.94.A8.E5.8F.8A.E6.B3.A8.E9.87.8A)

## 生成

[天使](/index.php?title=%E5%A4%A9%E4%BD%BF\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "天使 (page does not exist)")和[亚历克斯](/index.php?title=%E4%BA%9A%E5%8E%86%E5%85%8B%E6%96%AF\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "亚历克斯 (page does not exist)")在生成时有3⁄4的概率[获得](/index.php?title=%E6%80%AA%E7%89%A9%E8%B5%B7%E5%A7%8B%E7%89%A9%E5%93%81\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "怪物起始物品 (page does not exist)")一面[防侵蚀](/index.php?title=%E9%98%B2%E4%BE%B5%E8%9A%80\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "防侵蚀 (page does not exist)")的大盾牌[\[1\]](#cite_note-1)。[雇佣兵](/index.php?title=%E9%9B%87%E4%BD%A3%E5%85%B5\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "雇佣兵 (page does not exist)")类怪物在生成时若没有获得[小盾牌](/wiki/%E5%B0%8F%E7%9B%BE%E7%89%8C "小盾牌")，则有1⁄2的概率获得一面大盾牌（因此他们生成时获得大盾牌的总概率是1⁄6）[\[2\]](#cite_note-2)。

## 描述

大盾牌的基础[AC](/index.php?title=AC/zh-CN\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "AC/zh-CN (page does not exist)")加成为2。

## 策略

很少有玩家会使用大盾牌，因为多数玩家在游戏前期会更容易在[侏儒矿坑](/index.php?title=%E4%BE%8F%E5%84%92%E7%9F%BF%E5%9D%91\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "侏儒矿坑 (page does not exist)")里找到效果与大盾牌基本没有区别的[矮人圆盾](/wiki/%E7%9F%AE%E4%BA%BA%E5%9C%86%E7%9B%BE "矮人圆盾")，而施法角色则一般使用[小盾牌](/wiki/%E5%B0%8F%E7%9B%BE%E7%89%8C "小盾牌")，因为它更轻，而且对[施法](/index.php?title=%E6%96%BD%E6%B3%95\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "施法 (page does not exist)")的惩罚更低。长期使用盾牌的角色在游戏中后期一般会用[精灵盾](/wiki/%E7%B2%BE%E7%81%B5%E7%9B%BE "精灵盾")或[反射之盾](/wiki/%E5%8F%8D%E5%B0%84%E4%B9%8B%E7%9B%BE "反射之盾")，这两种盾牌的基础防御力和大盾牌相同，但是更轻。

## 历史

大盾牌最初于[NetHack 3.0.0](/wiki/NetHack_3.0.0 "NetHack 3.0.0")加入游戏。

## Variants

**此条目或段落的部分内容需要翻译。**  
您可以帮助我们[**翻译此页面**](https://nethackwiki.com/index.php?title=Large_shield/zh-CN\&action=edit)，但**请勿使用机器翻译**。

### SLASH'EM

In [SLASH'EM](/wiki/SLASH%27EM "SLASH'EM"), [Knights](/wiki/Knight "Knight") start the game with a large shield rather than a small one.

[Upgrading](/wiki/Upgrading "Upgrading") a large shield will produce a dwarvish roundshield and vice versa.

### dNetHack

In [dNetHack](/wiki/DNetHack "DNetHack"), the large shield is renamed to the [kite shield](/index.php?title=Kite_shield\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "Kite shield (page does not exist)"), due to object sizing allowing for the creation of large-sized shields.

### SpliceHack

In [SpliceHack](/wiki/SpliceHack "SpliceHack"), a large shield can be combined with an [amulet of reflection](/wiki/Amulet_of_reflection "Amulet of reflection") at a [furnace](/wiki/Furnace "Furnace") to create a shield of reflection.

SpliceHack adds [Pridwen](/index.php?title=Pridwen\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "Pridwen (page does not exist)"), a lawful [artifact](/wiki/Artifact "Artifact") large shield that confers [half physical damage](/wiki/Half_physical_damage "Half physical damage") while worn.

### EvilHack

In [EvilHack](/wiki/EvilHack "EvilHack"), Knights also start the game with a large shield; [drow](/wiki/Drow_\(starting_race\) "Drow (starting race)") Knights receive a set of [dark elven bracers](/wiki/Dark_elven_bracers "Dark elven bracers") instead.

A large shield can be created at a [forge](/wiki/Forge_\(dungeon_feature\) "Forge (dungeon feature)") by combining two [helmets](/wiki/Helmet "Helmet"). Large shields can be used to forge a couple of other items:

- A large shield can be combined with a [dwarvish helm](/wiki/Dwarvish_helm "Dwarvish helm") to create a dwarvish roundshield.
- A large shield can be combined with a helmet to create [ring mail](/wiki/Ring_mail "Ring mail").

### SlashTHEM

In [SlashTHEM](/wiki/SlashTHEM "SlashTHEM"), in addition to SLASH'EM details, [player monster](/wiki/Player_monster "Player monster") [knights](/wiki/Knight_\(player_monster\) "Knight (player monster)"), [lunatic](/index.php?title=Lunatic_\(player_monster\)\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "Lunatic (player monster) (page does not exist)") and [warriors](/index.php?title=Warrior_\(player_monster\)\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "Warrior (player monster) (page does not exist)") generate with large shields. The [militant cleric](/wiki/Militant_cleric "Militant cleric") of the rebel party that serves as the default [Noble quest](/wiki/Noble_quest "Noble quest") nemesis generates with a large shield.

### Hack'EM

In [Hack'EM](/wiki/Hack%27EM "Hack'EM"), upgrading a large shield will produce a [tower shield](/wiki/Tower_shield "Tower shield") and vice versa. In addition to forging recipes from EvilHack, a large shield can be combined with a small shield to create a tower shield.

Hack'EM also adds Pridwen from SpliceHack, which confers [knockback resistance](/index.php?title=Knockback_resistance\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "Knockback resistance (page does not exist)") and prevents its wearer from becoming [afraid](/wiki/Afraid "Afraid") in addition to half physical damage.

## 引用及注释

1. [↑](#cite_ref-1) [src/makemon.c in NetHack 3.6.7, line 340](https://github.com/NetHack/NetHack/blob/NetHack-3.6.7_Released/src/makemon.c#L340)
2. [↑](#cite_ref-2) [src/makemon.c in NetHack 3.6.7, line 640](https://github.com/NetHack/NetHack/blob/NetHack-3.6.7_Released/src/makemon.c#L640)

大盾牌（large shield）是NetHack中的一种盾牌类防具。它由铁制成。

Contents

  • 1 生成
  • 2 描述
  • 3 策略
  • 4 历史

生成

天使和亚历克斯在生成时有3⁄4的概率获得一面防侵蚀的大盾牌[1]。雇佣兵类怪物在生成时若没有获得小盾牌，则有1⁄2的概率获得一面大盾牌（因此他们生成时获得大盾牌的总概率是1⁄6）[2]。

描述

大盾牌的基础AC加成为2。

策略

很少有玩家会使用大盾牌，因为多数玩家在游戏前期会更容易在侏儒矿坑里找到效果与大盾牌基本没有区别的矮人圆盾，而施法角色则一般使用小盾牌，因为它更轻，而且对施法的惩罚更低。长期使用盾牌的角色在游戏中后期一般会用精灵盾或反射之盾，这两种盾牌的基础防御力和大盾牌相同，但是更轻。

历史

大盾牌最初于NetHack 3.0.0加入游戏。

Variants

您可以帮助我们翻译此页面，但请勿使用机器翻译。

SLASH'EM

In SLASH'EM, Knights start the game with a large shield rather than a small one.

Upgrading a large shield will produce a dwarvish roundshield and vice versa.

dNetHack

In dNetHack, the large shield is renamed to the kite shield, due to object sizing allowing for the creation of large-sized shields.

SpliceHack

In SpliceHack, a large shield can be combined with an amulet of reflection at a furnace to create a shield of reflection.

SpliceHack adds Pridwen, a lawful artifact large shield that confers half physical damage while worn.

EvilHack

In EvilHack, Knights also start the game with a large shield; drow Knights receive a set of dark elven bracers instead.

A large shield can be created at a forge by combining two helmets. Large shields can be used to forge a couple of other items:

  • A large shield can be combined with a dwarvish helm to create a dwarvish roundshield.
  • A large shield can be combined with a helmet to create ring mail.

SlashTHEM

In SlashTHEM, in addition to SLASH'EM details, player monster knights, lunatic and warriors generate with large shields. The militant cleric of the rebel party that serves as the default Noble quest nemesis generates with a large shield.

Hack'EM

In Hack'EM, upgrading a large shield will produce a tower shield and vice versa. In addition to forging recipes from EvilHack, a large shield can be combined with a small shield to create a tower shield.

Hack'EM also adds Pridwen from SpliceHack, which confers knockback resistance and prevents its wearer from becoming afraid in addition to half physical damage.
